ðŸ“– Summary: Lemuroid is an open-source Android emulator based on Libretro, designed for ease of use and good Android integration. It supports a wide range of classic gaming systems, from Atari to PlayStation Portable, and offers features like automatic save states, ROM scanning, optimized touch controls, and gamepad support, providing a comprehensive retro gaming experience on Android devices.
